example.description: Creates a single 'm1.large' instance of the ami 'ami-1a2b3c4d' in the current default region.

example.code:
PS C:\>$bdm = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.BlockDeviceMapping PS C:\>$bdm.VirtualName = "ephemeral0" PS C:\>$bdm.DeviceName = "/dev/sdb"
PS C:\>$ami = Get-EC2ImageByName WINDOWS_2012_BASE
PS C:\>New-EC2Instance -ImageId $ami.ImageId -MinCount 1 -MaxCount 1 -InstanceType m1.large -BlockDeviceMapping $bdm
example.description: This example launches an m1.large instance of the latest Windows Server 2012 base ami and maps an instance store volume.
